name: Around the globe
description: Take a trip into outerspace and see the world like never before. Stay aboard the ISS and get a peek at what life for astronauts is really like.

features.name: A killer view
features.description: view all the wonders of the world, from 250 miles above

name: Low Orbit Joyride
description: Cross over the Line and see the curvature of the earth, get an amazing experience at an amazing price point

name: Space walk
description: Take a step out into space.

name: One Small Step
description: Become one of the very few lucky individuals to have stepped onto the moon. Coming soon in 2025.
